title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 599 of 2020), hereby make
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Sunbeds)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Sunbeds) 

(Health Information) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the Regulations of 2015 and these 
Regulations may be cited together as the Public Health (Sunbeds) (Health 
Information) Regulations 2015 to 2022.

title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 599 of 2020), hereby make
heading: 3. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations (as amended by Regulation 3
text_raw:
3. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations (as amended by Regulation 3 

of the Regulations of 2015) is amended— 

(a) by substituting for paragraph (2) the following: 

“(2) The form prescribed in paragraph (1) shall contain the text 
set out in Schedule 2 and shall— 

(a) be printed in black indelible ink on white paper or 

white cardboard, or 

(b) be displayed on a screen in black text on a white 
background, in a form which allows for electronic 
signature, 

in verdana typeface and a font size of at least 14.”, and 

(b) by substituting for paragraph (4) the following: 

“(4) The form prescribed in paragraph (3) shall contain the text 
set out in Schedule 3 and shall— 

(a) be printed in black indelible ink on white paper or 

white cardboard, or 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [353] 3 

(b) be displayed on a screen in black text on a white 
background, in a form which allows for electronic 
signature or mark by the person proposing to use, hire 
or purchase a sunbed, and which allows for electronic 
signature by the owner, manager or employee of the 
sunbed business, 

in verdana typeface and a font size of at least 14.”. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 12 July 2022 

FRANK FEIGHAN, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [353]

title: Ministerial Functions) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 599 of 2020), hereby make
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Public Health (Sunbeds) (Health Information) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 50 of 2015), as amended by the Public Health 
(Sunbeds) (Health Information) (Amendment) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 168 
of 2015), to allow for persons using, hiring or purchasing sunbeds to confirm 
by electronic means that they have been provided with a copy of the prescribed 
information and have had an opportunity to read and consider same. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Public Health (Sunbeds) (Health 
Information) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [353] 5
